channel.title: Windows on Technology with Safi
channel.description: Recent content in Windows on Technology with Safi

item.title: How to Install Wine on Raspberry Pi OS 64-bit Bullseye and run Classic Windows Games
item.description: Installing Wine and running classic Windows games on Raspberry Pi 64-bit is a bit tricky but it can be done through my guide easily.

item.title: Virtualization in old x86 CPUs
item.description: We all know that modern x86 CPUs can do hardware virtualization but do you know a form of virtualization has existed in all x86 CPUs since the 1980s?
